resources.string: Camera could not be opened.\nThis occurs when the camera is not available (for example it is already in use) or if the system has denied access (for example when camera access has been disabled).
Below is the implementation for requesting permissions at runtime.\nClick the button below to request the Camera permission and open a full-screen camera preview.
Click the button to request the Camera permission and open a full-screen camera preview.
Camera access is required to display the camera preview.
Permission is not available. Kindly click the button below.
Camera permission is available. Starting preview.
Camera permission was granted. Starting preview.
